ModMetaData.name: EndlessGrowth
ModMetaData.author: Slime-Senpai
ModMetaData.description: This mod removes the skill cap of 20, making it possible to scale way higher. Although there is no theoretical limit, my lazyness made me make everything scale up to 100. Level 100 requires 650K XP to reach from level 99 so it should be fine to assume no one will ever reach it.
